column2: 这个孩子与它的家族相像 - 但是微妙的差异将决定其他人如何对待[GetHerHis]出现。
当这个孩子开始喂养和成长，你就会逐渐看到[GetHerHis]未来的体力和耐力的种种迹象。
愿[GetSheHe]变得和过去的英雄们一样健康活泼！
当这个孩子与世界互动时，你会知道[GetSheHe]是否在心智上像[GetHerHis]父母。
祈祷[GetSheHe]即使在子宫里也能从[GetHerHis]家人那里学到东西。
Pretty sure you shouldn't see this
This youth has spent years learning about matters of war and feats of valor! [GetHerHis] highly active lifestyle has led [GetHerHim] to become stronger.
This youngster has never been one to spend much time playing or working outdoors, or training for a career in the army. As a result, [GetHerHis] childhood's vigor has atrophied in adolescence.
This youth has demonstrated an exceptional gift for intellectual achievement. Perhaps [GetSheHe]'s smarter than you thought!
This youngster has always shied away from book learning, and never applied [GetHerHis]selves to the world of thought. [GetHerHis] natural promise has dulled as an adolescent.
This youth has gone through [GetHerHis] awkward phase, and matured into a person much easier on the eyes.
This youngster isn't quite as cute as [GetSheHe] was as a child, anymore, and it shows.
This youth has grown into a much more coordinated adolescent - well, at least compared to some others.
This youngster seems even more awkward than most people [GetHerHis] age. You're not sure if [GetSheHe]'ll ever totally grow out of it.
This youth has had a growth spurt! [GetHeShe] has shot up to heights you certainly didn't see coming!
This youngster hasn't grown as much as you've expected, during adolesence. Perhaps [GetSheHe] won't get as tall as you thought, as an adult.

This young adult has dedicated even more time to swordplay since [GetHerHis] teenage years. [GetHerHis] interest and persistence has paid off, and [GetSheHe] now demonstrates much more skill with a blade.
